title: Trump teases a presidential run and dangles pardons for January 6 rioters at Texas rally - CNN
content:
1. Trump teases a presidential run and dangles pardons for January 6 rioters at Texas rally  CNN

description: Former President Donald Trump on Saturday teased a 2024 presidential candidacy and said he would consider pardoning those who were charged in connection with the deadly January 6, 2021, attack on the US Capitol if he wins the White House again.
